title: Monopoly MR curve is below demand

content.question: A monopoly is different from a perfectly competitive firm in that a monopoly

choices.label: does not have a U-shaped average total cost curve
has an average fixed cost curve that is perfectly horizontal
has a marginal revenue curve that lies below its demand curve
operates in the inelastic segment of its demand curve

content.answer: has a marginal revenue curve that lies below its demand curve

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
